transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji, madam. Pradeep ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Ji, ho rahi hai.
Executive: Sir, main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, cataloging team se.
Customer: Haan, se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Sorry?
Executive: IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu, sir.
Customer: Haan, boliye. Aapki, aapki services hamare saath run ho rahi hai na, sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, toh usi ke regarding sir maine call kiya tha aapko. Like abhi recently aapne call kiya tha sir hamare customer care ko, aapka kuch concern tha sir uske regarding?
Customer: WhatsApp sir, ek customer ka enquiry aaya tha, maine sirf dekhte dekhte wo ek, 3 minute ke andar wo consume ho gaya customer, yahi iske liye phone kiya tha.
Hospital bedsheet ka tha customer ka, sample ka, 500 piece ka, 3 minute, 3 minute ke andar wo ho gaya, iske liye phone kiya tha.
Executive: Achha achha. Actually sir wo isliye sold out ho gaya, waha aapko sold out show kar raha hoga jab aapne consume kiya hoga, right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, toh wo sir isliye aapko sold out show kar raha tha kyunki aapko aapke account manager...
Customer: Sold out nahi, expiry karke dikha raha hai, expiry dikha raha hai.
Executive: Haan, matlab, haan, expire ho gaya wo. Haan, hospital bedsheet ka tha, Kolkata ka, 500 piece ka, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, haan toh wahi hai, sold out ho gayi hai wo lead. Toh sir wo isliye hui hai kyunki aapko aapke account manager jo hai, Ujjwal ji, unhone bhi aapko bataya hoga ki ek lead ko paanch log hi consume kar sakte hain.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Theek hai? Toh wo isliye aapko jaise aayi, ho sakta hai aap us jis time pe wo generate hui lead, us time pe aap busy ho, aapne 2-3-5 minute baad dekhi, right? Toh suppose aap jaise aapne 2-3-5 minute baad dekhi hai, toh aapne jab usse click kiya toh wo expired dikha rahi thi. Toh wo usse pehle paanch log usse consume kar chuke the, is wajah se sir wo expired dikha rahi thi.
Toh aap ye try kiya karo ki waha pe jab bhi aapko notification aata hai, jo bhi aata hai toh aap us time pe wo lead open karke dekh lo, chahe aap busy bhi ho toh bhi. Matlab thoda aap ek minute hi lagega aapko.
Customer: Hum aapko kya bol rahe hain ki ek minute ke andar humne check kiya hai aur 3 minute, 2 minute mein hum call kiya hai, usse pehle hi wo expire ho gaya.
Executive: Sir, main wahi bol rahi hu aapko, aap 3 minute ka bol rahe ho, kabhi kabhi toh lead 1 minute mein bhi expire ho jati hai.
Matlab aapki jo product line hai na, bedsheets wagera ki, hospital bedsheets ki, toh usme na competition zyada hai sir aapki product line mein. Matlab aap competition aapme, matlab aapki product line mein thoda zyada hai, is wajah se matlab jo bhi highly active hota hai na us time pe, aap 3 minute ka bol rahe ho, main toh aapse 1 minute ka bhi sir bol rahi hu, ki kaafi matlab hamare paas concern ye bhi aata hai ki hamari lead 1 minute mein bhi sold out ho jati hai.
Seconds mein, 1 minute mein bhi sold out ho jati hai, isliye main aapko bol rahi hu ki jis time pe bhi aapko aaye na notification, aap us time pe dekh ke uspe click kar do bas jaldi se. Kyunki sir paanch log se zyada nahi consume kar sakte hain. Toh ho sakta hai wo jab aapne dekhi na usse pehle hi paanch log tak 3 minute mein aap khud socho, 3 minute mein paanch log ne consume kar li toh wo sold out dikhane lagi. Ab aap ye kar sakte ho, usi lead pe, matlab past leads mein jaake aap uspe I am interested kar do. Jisse ki aage se us category ki, us quantity, us product ki leads aapko aane shuru ho jaaye aage se aur.
Toh aap ye kar sakte ho ki waha pe I am interested kar sakte ho. Aapko pata hai ki past leads pe kaise dekhte hain past leads?
Customer: Nahi malum nahi hai.
Executive: Main bata deti hu aapko. Aap jab file lead wala page open karoge na, toh side pe aapko ek option aata hai, neeche kar, neeche aapko teen chaar options aate hain, usme sabse pehla option hota hai past leads karke.
Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai? Agar aap uspe click karoge past leads pe toh waha pe saari jo expired lead ho chuki hai na, wahi aapko show karengi. Jo expire already ho chuki hain. Chahe wo 10 minute pehle ki ho, chahe wo 10 ghante pehle ki ho. Wahi show karengi. Toh unme agar aapko ye lagta hai ki mere se ye lead miss ho gayi, main ise consume nahi kar paya, toh aap waha pe neeche option jaise aap consume karne ka option aata hai na, contact buyer now, waha pe option aayega I am interested.
Toh aap uspe agar click karoge na, toh aage se wo us quantity, product aur us category ki leads aana aapko start ho jayengi. Toh aap ye kar sakte ho usme.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Theek hai? Haan, toh bas aap itna karna sir ki aap waha pe matlab jaise abhi aapki ek lead miss ho gayi aapse, aage se aap try karna ki koi bhi lead aapse miss na ho. Matlab aap usi time pe bas aap jaldi jis time pe aap dekh rahe ho aur wo aapko dikh rahi hai, usi time pe aap contact buyer now kar do. Kyunki paanch log se zyada use consume nahi kar sakte sir isliye.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to consume lead in time.

Resolution:

- Explained reason for lead expiry.

- Suggested using 'I am interested' feature.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, expiry, i am interested
